title: Add Google Search Console verification meta tag to homepage head

requirements.summary: Add the provided Google Search Console verification meta tag to the static HTML entrypoint so it is present on initial home page load.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/index.html contains <meta name="google-site-verification" content="jiX9_ApHGMseCG4mi-MUNxWqe4-XW7LiWlKq_81pkwQ" /> inside the <head> element.
When loading the app in a browser, View Source shows the verification meta tag in the <head>.
No React runtime errors or TypeScript build errors are introduced.

file_operations.description: Insert <meta name="google-site-verification" content="jiX9_ApHGMseCG4mi-MUNxWqe4-XW7LiWlKq_81pkwQ" /> within the <head> section (alongside existing meta charset/viewport) so it appears in initial HTML on home page load.
